description: Internal alterations and works including decoration; repainting walls; replacing radiators; positioning of new sockets; potential updating of electrical wiring/fuse board; installation of new kitchen in position of large bathroom and boiler; installation of new electric induction system with recycle vent system; possible boiler replacement; installation of new bathroom with necessary fixtures and fittings, in area that was formed in area of former staircase, tanking and strengthening floor structure where required, tile sections of walls; move existing recessed light in living room and add additional ones.
reference_no_of_permission_being_relied_: Consents were previously granted for the same proposed works under applications LB/21/07501 and PP/21/07500.
